data.title: The Best Movies and TV Shows Coming to Netflix, HBO, Amazon Prime, and Hulu in May
data.meta_description: Broker, All American, Parasite, and Forgetting Sarah Marshall are just a few of the great movies coming to streaming this month.
data.text:
Every month, tons of new movies and TV shows become available to stream for free for U.S. subscribers to services like Netflix, HBO Max, Prime Video, and Hulu. With so many different streaming services, it can be hard to keep track of them all—especially if you belong to more than one. Below, we present to you the ultimate streaming guide. We’ll let you decide which service has the best new titles. (All titles arrive May 1 unless otherwise specified.)
